# Crown of Blasting, Minor
## Overview
**Aura** moderate evocation; **CL** 6th

**Slot** head

**Price** 6,480 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

On command, this simple golden crown projects a blast of *[[Searing Light (Spell)|searing light]]* (3d8 points of damage) once per day.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Searing Light (Spell)|searing light]]*

**Cost** 3,240 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 507
